testsuite.name: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: ACME Main Page displays page title
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: ACME Main Page displays page title Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 15.272s Then There is a title shown on the page ... passed in 0.169s And The title tag contains "Dashboard" ... passed in 0.053s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays navigation bar
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays navigation bar Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 17.327s Then The navigation bar header "ACME System 1" is displayed ... passed in 0.086s And The navigation link "Home" is displayed ... passed in 0.191s And The navigation link "Log Out" is displayed ... passed in 0.127s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays breadcrumbs
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays breadcrumbs Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 18.698s Then The breadcrumb "Home" is displayed ... passed in 0.220s And The breadcrumb "Dashboard" is displayed ... passed in 0.096s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays container header and note
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays container header and note Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 31.828s Then Main Page displays container header ... passed in 0.031s And Main Page container header tag contains "Welcome, " "valid_email"" to System 1." ... passed in 0.047s And Container note displays "If this is your first time logging in, please make sure to go to User Options -> Reset Test Data" ... passed in 0.077s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays footer
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays footer Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 17.403s Then There is a footer shown on the page ... passed in 0.042s And The text displayed is "Copyright Â© 2020 ACME Systems" ... passed in 0.078s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Main page displays buttons
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Main page displays buttons Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 22.343s Then There is a "User options" button displayed ... passed in 0.484s And There is a "Work Items" button displayed ... passed in 0.219s And There is a "Accounts" button displayed ... passed in 0.281s And There is a "Checks" button displayed ... passed in 0.238s And There is a "Vendors" button displayed ... passed in 0.281s And There is a "Invoices" button displayed ... passed in 0.312s And There is a "Internal Invoices" button displayed ... passed in 0.235s And There is a "Reports" button displayed ... passed in 0.375s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.main.contents.Test Contents of the Main Page
testcase.name: Dropdown menu displayed when Accounts is clicked
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Dropdown menu displayed when Accounts is clicked Given I am on the Main Page ... passed in 27.927s When I click "Accounts" button ... passed in 1.603s Then "Add account modification" is available from the dropdown menu ... passed in 11.203s And "View account history" is available from the dropdown menu ... passed in 0.406s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
